name: Come Fuel With Me
description:
GMTK Game Jame 2021 : Joined Together


Come Fuel With Me

How To Get Started

  • Download the rar for windows or zip mac, whichever platform you are on
  • On Windows:
    1. Extract the files out of the rar
    2. run come_fly_with_me.exe
  • On Mac:
    1. Extract the files out of the zip
    2. run the .app directory
  • On Windows without winrar:
    1. Download the "win.zip" instead
    2. Extract files out of the zip
    3. run come_fly_with_me.exe
    4. Accept the trust warning from windows

Aim Of The Game

Refuel the plane in the fastest time, whilst avoiding all the airborne obstacles that might hit you or the refuelling hose!

* Move your refuelling plane with WASD

* The Hose Nozzle points towards your cursor

* Left Click to fire hose at refuel spot on recipient

* If it hits the refuel spot, hose connects and fuel starts pumping

* Right Click to disconnect hose

* Hose also disconnects if you get too far away or it gets hit, be careful!

Your score is based on how long you take to refill minus how much you get hit
